TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF CHINA BUYS SHARE IN LUXEMBOURG COMPANY
TEXT.BODY: State-owned Bank of China has bought a three to five pct share of BAII Holding SA, a financial institution registered in Luxembourg, the China Daily Business Weekly said. It said the institution is 50 pct owned by Arab interests and has set up a wholly owned commercial banking branch in Hong Kong but gave no more details. REUTER
